mapper.select: SELECT dp.id AS playerId, dc.name AS characterName, dpr.is_sp AS isSp, dpr.identity_desc AS identityDesc, dpr.camp AS camp, dpr.is_life AS isLife, dpr.is_mute AS isMute, dpr.action AS action, dpr.privilege AS privilege, dpr.feedback AS feedback, dpr.vote AS vote, dpr.submit_time AS submitTime, dpr.remark AS remark FROM d_game dg, d_player dp, d_player_record dpr, d_character dc WHERE dg.status > 2 AND dg.status != 9 AND dp.game_id=#{gameId} AND dp.id = dpr.player_id AND dpr.character_id = dc.id
